programlisting: class TextractWrapper: """Encapsulates Textract functions.""" def __init__(self, textract_client, s3_resource, sqs_resource): """ :param textract_client: A Boto3 Textract client. :param s3_resource: A Boto3 Amazon S3 resource. :param sqs_resource: A Boto3 Amazon SQS resource. """ self.textract_client = textract_client self.s3_resource = s3_resource self.sqs_resource = sqs_resource
